loginpage.thereWasAn:
There was an error sending you the access code:
 {a}
loginpage.pleaseEnterYour: Please enter your email to receive a login link or code.

loginsuccess.loginWasSuccessful: Login was successful, please check your inbox (including the spam folder) for your login link.
loginsuccess.ifYouGetYourEmail: If you get your mail in a different device or you're having trouble with the link, you can also enter the OTP code below.

registerpage.welcomeToThe:
Welcome to the registration page. Please enter your data as it appears
        on the message that you received, and the email that you would like to
        use to login.

plusone.pleaseEnterThe:
Please enter the details of your plus one. An account will be created for
      them, and they will be able to log in using their email.

listview.alreadyAnswered: You have already answered these questions.
listview.done: You're all done for the day!
listview.noMessage: Couldn't find any message that matches your search.

tour.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the tour? You can always access it again by clicking on the (i) button in the homepage.
tour.intro:
Welcome to our wedding App! 

 We built this app from the ground up so that you could have a great experience getting ready for our wedding. Here, you will be able to access all information regarding the celebrations and join us as we prepare for our special day. 

 Click the 'Next' button to have a quick look around.
tour.mobile-menu: Click on the button above to open the mobile navigation men√∫.
tour.invite: Behind this button, you can find the digital invite for the wedding!
tour.information: In this section, you will find all the information about the wedding celebrations, including Events, Travel, Tips and more.
tour.guestbook: You can also open the Guestbook, where you can find all the messages from the other invitees and you can leave your own.

inbox.navbar: In the Inbox, you will find communications from the bride and groom, including important questions that you will be able to answer directly on the app.
inbox.list: Here is the list of active messages. You can even search this list if you're looking for an old message.
inbox.detail: This is the message view. In case the message has questions, you will be able to answer them directly on this page.
inbox.pushNotification: Clicking on this button, you can opt in to be notified any time there is a new message or information available!

tour.gallery: In the gallery you will find the pictures from the celebration.
tour.profile:
The profile section allows you to check your information, and log out of the app if necessary. 

 You may also install this app by clicking on the 'Add to Home Screen' option on your browser.

listitem.youAlreadyReplied: You already replied to this message.
listitem.youStillHavent: You still haven't replied to this message.

thehome.weAreDelighted:
we are delighted to invite you to our wedding in Rome.
          The Eternal City is where we found each other and fell in love, and we would love to have you join us in the celebration!

theinvitation.brideParentsLine1: Daniel Cabrera Uscanga and Regina Matos Cano
theinvitation.groomParentsLine1: Renato R. Spinelli and Vincenza Alessio Ruffo
theinvitation.groomParentsLine2: di Calabria announce the wedding of
theinvitation.eventLocation: Basilica dei Santi Giovanni e Paolo al Celio
theinvitation.atTheEndOfTheCeremony: At the end of the ceremony
theinvitation.willBeGratefulForYourPresenceAt: will be grateful for your presence at
